item.title: Image Tools
item.description: Image edit Tools Here are some tools we use a lot and have been used when making games for pinball. A quick way to install anything is through chocolatey. Inkscape (scalable vector) choco install inkscape ðŸ”— Inkscape (chocolatey) ImageMagick (converting webp) choco install imagemagick.app ðŸ”— ImageMagick (chocolatey) Gimp (Image editing) choco install gimp ðŸ”— Gimp (chocolatey)
